explains: v. 出版；发行（publish 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: published price 图书零售价；定价；公布价格

sentences.en: It was published in hardback last year.
sentences.cn: 这书去年以精装本出版。

sentences.en: In retirement he published his memoirs.
sentences.cn: 退休后他出版了他的回忆录。

sentences.en: The newspaper is published twice weekly.
sentences.cn: 这份报纸每周出版两次。
